steps: Line a baking pan with wax paper for storing rolled bites.
Combine dates, pecans, and cashews in a food processor fitted with an “ S ” blade. Process until the mixture becomes fine and uniform throughout.
Add cocoa powder, salt, almond butter, almond milk, and vanilla to the processor. Blend until the mixture just starts to clump together and holds when squeezed.
Measure 1 tablespoon portions of the mixture and roll each into a ball. Place on the prepared baking sheet.
Transfer the rolled energy balls to an airtight container and refrigerate or freeze until chilled and hardened.
Serve cold or at room temperature.
title: Chocolate Date Energy Balls
